text: Lolland is the fourth-largest island of Denmark. About 63,000 people were living on this island in 2013. It has an area of 1,243 kmÂ². Lolland lies in the very south of Denmark, and near Germany in the Baltic Sea. Lolland has an oceanic climate, the highest temperature ever measured in Lolland was on 20 July 2022. Category:Islands of Denmark Category:Baltic Sea
title: Lolland
